# Pre-requisite
## Load packages

## Load dataset

```{r}

# Load Dataset
dataset <- read_excel("dataset/Sales_Dataset.xlsx")

```

# Exploratory Data Analysis

```{r}
summary(dataset)
```
```{r}
plot(dataset)
cor(dataset)
```

```{r}

lm_model = lm(Sales ~ . , data=dataset)
summary(lm_model)
```
Radio, Newspaper, Billboard had p-value greater than 0.05.This mean that they are not fatalistically significant in predicting Sales
